Players can push them back and forth to till the soil which earns Hosidius favour. A plough can only be used by one player at a time. Ploughs that are in-use by players cannot be used by another until a period of time of inactivity has elapsed.

Ploughs are found in the south-east of Hosidius, north-west of the Tithe farm, south-west of the Vinery. Players can push them back and forth to till the soil which earns Hosidius favour. A plough can only be used by one player at a time. Ploughs that are in-use by players cannot be used by another until a period of time of inactivity has elapsed.

While ploughing, every tile has an approximate 12% chance to yield 10 Farming experience and 0.2% favour.[1] However the ploughs break often and requires a hammer to fix, granting 10 Crafting experience in the process.

It appears that while in this activity, some random events are immediately dismissed should they appear.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • It is possible to turn the plough sideways. This is done by simply repairing the plough from the side.

'''Ploughs''' are found in the south-east of [[Hosidius]], north-west of the Tithe farm, south-west of the Vinery. Players can push them back and forth to till the soil which earns Hosidius [[favour]]. A plough can only be used by one player at a time. Ploughs that are in-use by players cannot be used by another until a period of time of inactivity has elapsed.

While ploughing, every tile has an approximate 12% chance to yield 10 [[Farming]] experience and 0.2% favour.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1478322503407878144|date=4 January 2022|archiveurl=https://archive.is/5eCBI|archivedate=4 January 2022|quote=Ploughs: About 12% per tile.}} However the ploughs break often and requires a [[hammer]] to fix, granting 10 [[Crafting]] experience in the process.

It appears that while in this activity, some random events are immediately dismissed should they appear.
